title: Shop issue, champion missing
body:
So **about 2-3 months** ago I bought **Talon**, it was my very first champion, and I loved the style he's playing, but I haven't played him for a week or two and now when I wanted to do so, **he was missing**, he's not even in my inventory... I got mastery level 5 on him and one mastery shard (wich I can still see) but when I click on the shaded display picture of him, it pop-ups **like I never owned him before** and I can buy him for cca 4800 ip... Please help me, I don't have much time to spend on Leauge of Legends because of school and such so it's not easy for me to get that amount of IP, otherwise I couldn't have this problem.
Thanks

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like Talon was refunded through a refund token.  If this wasn't intended, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll take a closer look at your specific issue individually to see if we can figure something out.  We'll get back to you!
